main.name: Pareesh Madan
main.description: Passionate Software Engineer/Computer Science Student at University of Guelph
main.bio: I have always been fascinated with the boundless and infinite capabilities of computers which motivated me to pursue a future in Computer Science. This desire was strengthened ever since the joy I received after succeeding in writing recursive function calls for a grade 11 minesweeper game.
